name: tm04
effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user switches places with a different Pokémon instantly, using telekinetic power.
